backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user profiles, trades, mistakes, subscriptions, payments, admin access, and QR code storage with authorization mixins and multiple data maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing rollback and restore-related features with impacted files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to brief descriptions of their UI, logic, and feature behavior for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode styling throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, theme initialization, runtime env config, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/domain-slug.txt: Plain text file defining the app’s domain slug.
frontend/public/env.json: Environment config placeholder containing the backend canister ID value.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, entitlement-based tab navigation, profile setup, and page layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Admin password dialog allowing protected access to admin features with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDisco: Dialog component for listing, creating, editing, enabling/disabling, and deleting discount codes with form state management.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Main admin dashboard providing navigation to user management and various admin dialogs for payments, methods, discounts, QR codes, and password rotation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPayme: Dialog for viewing, adding, editing, enabling/disabling, and deleting payment methods using CRUD hooks.
Dialog that displays, uploads, previews, validates, and clears the global payment QR code with progress tracking and error handling.
Dialog for reviewing pending payments, viewing proof files, and approving or rejecting payment submissions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRotat: Dialog component for permanent admins to validate, rotate, and save a new admin password with permission checks and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserD: Admin dialog showing user profile, trades, subscription status, and provides actions to activate, cancel, or remove a user.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error recovery for existing sessions.
frontend/src/components/journal/EditTrad: Dialog for editing or deleting a trade entry, updating fields and confirming deletions through API mutations.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalA: Header component displaying total trades, accuracy, and total P/L with loading skeletons when analytics are unavailable.
frontend/src/components/journal/ProfitCa: Monthly calendar summarizing daily P/L and trade counts, allowing date selection and month navigation.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeEnt: Form component for creating new trade entries, handling input fields, submission, and backend mutation state. Includes UI for date, session, pair, risk metrics, and outcome selection.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeLis: Displays a table of recorded trades with formatted dates, P/L calculations, and optional editing actions. Shows loading skeletons and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/layout/ViewConta: Simple wrapper component providing layout structure with background and text styling. Renders child content inside a styled container.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/EditMis: Dialog for editing or deleting a mistake entry, including form handling and backend update/delete mutations. Supports delete confirmation through an alert dialog.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/Mistake: Form for logging new trading mistakes with date, category, and description. Submits data via createMistake mutation and resets fields on success.
Renders a list of mistake entries with category badges, dates, descriptions, and AI suggestions. Supports editing entries and shows loading or empty states.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar rendering interactive tabs with icons and labels. Highlights the active tab and triggers tab changes via callback.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: A dialog that collects full name and username to create a user profile and start a 2‑day free trial.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Pa: Handles subscription payment submission, including uploading a PDF proof, entering transaction details, and showing a success state.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Su: Displays trial and subscription status, available plans, and routes users to payment flow when a plan is selected.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Manages backend actor initialization with connection status, retries, timeouts, and access control setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useEntitlement.ts: Derives the user's feature entitlements from their subscription or trial state and exposes loading-aware access flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for initializing user access and performing CRUD operations on trades and mistakes via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages a light/dark theme with localStorage persistence and applies theme classes to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom theme variables, dark mode rules, layout helpers, and utility overrides.
frontend/src/lib/backendConnectionErrors: Classifies backend errors into user-friendly categories like authorization, stopped canister, or generic connection issues.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Collects runtime diagnostics about canister ID, environment, and deployment type, with helpers to format the output.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports static branding metadata including app name, tagline, and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/domainSlug.ts: Validates and generates URL-safe domain slugs and defines the app’s preset slug.
frontend/src/lib/pipValues.ts: Provides pip values for currency pairs and a helper to retrieve a pair’s pip value or null.
frontend/src/lib/riskCalculator.ts: Implements pip value lookup and a lot-size calculator with input validation.
frontend/src/lib/safeErrorMessage.ts: Normalizes backend and payment errors into readable, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/trades.ts: Utility functions to compute trade P/L and format currency or signed values.
frontend/src/lib/tradingPairs.ts: Exports selectable trading pair lists for general use and calculators, including common FX and metal pairs.
frontend/src/lib/userId.ts: Formats numeric user IDs to a padded #000000 style and parses them back to numbers with validation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/tabs/AdminPanelTab.tsx: Handles admin access checks and displays the admin panel or an access dialog based on authorization.
frontend/src/tabs/JournalTab.tsx: Loads trades and analytics, provides trade entry, and displays trades in list or calendar views.
frontend/src/tabs/MistakesTab.tsx: Fetches and displays trading mistakes with an entry form and AI suggestion notice.
frontend/src/tabs/ProfileTab.tsx: Shows user profile and subscription details with conditional loading, errors, and subscription view switching.
frontend/src/tabs/RiskCalculatorTab.tsx: Provides a risk calculator for position sizing based on account settings, risk mode, pip values, and trade inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for restoring an app to Version 35, detailing failed rollback attempts and existing restore-related features. Indicates the project is a fix request with no new features.
